Package io.micronaut.http.netty.body

Class NettyJsonStreamHandler<T>

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.netty.body.NettyJsonStreamHandler<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChunkedMessageBodyReader<T>, MessageBodyHandler<T>, MessageBodyReader<T>, MessageBodyWriter<T>, CustomizableNettyJsonHandler
@Internal @Singleton @Produces("application/x-json-stream") @Consumes("application/x-json-stream") public final class NettyJsonStreamHandler<T> extends Object implements MessageBodyHandler<T>, ChunkedMessageBodyReader<T>, CustomizableNettyJsonHandler
Netty json stream implementation for MessageBodyHandler.
Since:
4.0.0
